title: YAMU's Favourite Rainy Day Music
content:
Being a bunch of pluviophiles and coffee/ tea lovers, we're all currently huddled in our seats with warm mugs near us (well, some of us at any rate) and our earphones plugged in. These are a bit of what we're currently listening to.
If you still want to hear the rain through all of this, let
play in the background. It's the best. Have a great weekend ahead!
